author: adrianholovaty
message:
Fixed incorrect 'setting::' prefix in settings.txt

git-svn-id: http://code.djangoproject.com/svn/django/trunk@17312 bcc190cf-cafb-0310-a4f2-bffc1f526a37

files.patch:
@@ -1528,7 +1528,7 @@ A secret key for this particular Django installation. Used to provide a seed in
 secret-key hashing algorithms. Set this to a random string -- the longer, the
 better. ``django-admin.py startproject`` creates one automatically.
 
-.. setting:: SEND_BROKEN_LINK_EMAILS
+.. setting:: SECURE_PROXY_SSL_HEADER
 
 SECURE_PROXY_SSL_HEADER
 -----------------------
@@ -1588,6 +1588,8 @@ available in ``request.META``.)
     If any of those are not true, you should keep this setting set to ``None``
     and find another way of determining HTTPS, perhaps via custom middleware.
 
+.. setting:: SEND_BROKEN_LINK_EMAILS
+
 SEND_BROKEN_LINK_EMAILS
 -----------------------
